text: Giovanni Battista Tiepolo (March 5, 1696 â€“ March 27, 1770) was an Italian decorative painter of the Baroque. He was born in Venice and died in Madrid. He had nine children upon his wife Maria Cecilia Guardi. Two of his three sons became his assistants; the third became a priest. He worked churches and palaces in Italy, Germany, and Spain. ==Related pages== * List of Italian painters Category:1696 births Category:1770 deaths Category:18th-century Italian painters
title: Giovanni Battista Tiepolo
